about.text: Front-end developer who cares with self improvement, everyday becoming a better developer, husband, and friend.

family.title: Family
family.text1: In 2020 I met my wife at the bank where we worked. The pandemic kept us apart, but a few months later we started going out and it was the beginning of a beautiful journey of love and companionship. Today we are in college and have migrated to the technology area, me as a developer and she as a product manager and we work together from home.
family.text2: Temos duas parceiras que nos atrapalham no dia a dia mas as amamos muito, a Hana e Alecrim, que tivemos o prazer de cuidarmos desde cedo e nos acompanham por onde vamos.
family.text3: Nós moramos em Porto Alegre, adoramos ir ao cinema, andar de bicicleta, levar as gatas ao parque, comermos bem e passarmos tempo de qualidade com as famílias e amigos.

knowledge.title: What I use on my works
knowledge.text: Disclaimer: Against most of the developers that I have seen, I don't aim to study a lot of different languages and frameworks just to have a big 'hard skills' section on my resume that I suppose to know. My goal is to keep a few technologies and master them.

portfolio.text: I will soon be adding personal projects.

posts.phrase: I write articles to appear intelligent
posts.title1: How To Study and Consume Programming Contents
posts.text1: We are learning or lying to ourselves? Stop of just watch content and became a better programmer. A reflection about practice and procrastination with tech content for jr developers.

article1.title: How To Study and Consume Programming Contents
